title: 15 Best Bed and Bath Sales to Refresh Your Wellness Routine
description: Parachute, Cozy Earth, you name it—take up to 60% off brands’ best sellers
author: Bailey Berg
excerpt: From Parachute to Cozy Earth, we found the best bed and bath sales from editor-favorite brands. Shop sheets, bath towels, mattresses, and more for up to 60% off
text: When it comes to refreshing your home, few upgrades are as satisfying—or impactful—as new bedding and bath essentials. What’s more, the best bed and bath sales arrive like clockwork around this time of year so you can shop everything from luxurious sheets to premium bath towels at a discount. Whether it has to do with people welcoming change with the new year or wanting to keep warm when the chill of winter sets in, we’re not sure, but we’ll always welcome a deal. Plus, you can instantly elevate your daily routine, making your bedroom and bathroom feel like a five-star retreat.At Architectural Digest, we spend the entire year testing piles of sheets, bath mats, and everything in between. This list is packed with our favorite brands—think the luxe comfort of Saatva and the eco-friendly warmth of Buffy—that are offering deals right now to help you make a little home indulgence more accessible than ever.From the plush, insulating comforters that trap warmth without feeling too bulky to the ultrasoft towels that make getting out of the shower bearable, we’ve rounded up the top bed and bath sales happening now. Prepare to snuggle up—we’ve got you covered.Our Top Picks:Best Sheet Set: Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen Sheet Set, $538 $252Best Pillowcases: Cozy Earth Bamboo Pillowcases, $84 $67Best Duvet Cover: Homebird Soft & Cozy Sateen Reversible Duvet, $248 $186Best Mattress Pads: Sijo TempTun Cooling Mattress Pad, $175 $149Best Down Comforter: Brooklinen Down Comforter, $199 $159Best Bedding Sets: Buffy The Classic Set, $490 $345Best Bath Towel Set: White Classic Luxury Cotton Bath Towels, $48 $45ABC Carpet & Home: Over 20% OffIf you’re looking for a well-curated selection of duvet cover sets, hand towels, bath mats, shower curtains, and more, ABC, a New York City–based home decor brand, has you covered. Take over 20% off high-end bedding and bath finds through January 27.abcDNA Ruya Duvet SetabcDNA Layla Percale SheetsAmazon: Up to 45% OffSteep sales right this way: Check out Amazon for quality bath towels and sheet sets at a discount in the mega retailer’s daily deals page. “If you’re looking for a basic sheet at a bargain price, this sheet is a great pick,” says contributor Kristi Kellogg of the Mellanni Hotel Luxury Sheet Set. “It’s also available in every size and basically every color you could want, so you’ll definitely be able to find an option that matches the rest of your bedding.”White Classic Luxury Cotton Bath TowelsMellanni Hotel Luxury 1800 Sheet SetBrooklinen: Up to 20% OffBrooklinen has mastered the art of cozy. Known for its cloud-like comforters, this brand combines premium materials—like responsibly sourced down and lightweight down alternatives—with thoughtful details, like duvet loops, to keep your bedding in check. Now through January 21, they’re offering 20% off select items.Brooklinen Down ComforterBrooklinen Down PillowBrooklyn Bedding: Up to 25% OffBrooklyn Bedding is a one-stop shop for all things sleep—from bed frames to memory foam pillows. Everything sitewide (with or without a mattress purchase and even on new arrivals) is currently 30% off when using the promo code MLK30 at checkout.Brooklyn Bedding Microcoil Mattress TopperBrooklyn Bedding Ecosleep MattressBuffy: Up to 30% Off Bedding Sets and 15% Off SitewideBuffy is famous for its silky, smooth eucalyptus sheets that are colored with plant dye (think turmeric, gardenia, and pomegranate). As part of its winter sale, Buffy is offering 30% off its earth-friendly, award-winning Classic and Cooling bedding sets and 15% off everything else sitewide, like pillows. Describing the cloud pillow, AD senior entertainment editor Rachel Wallace says it’s a “soft yet supportive” pick that’s great for side sleepers.Buffy Breeze Sheet SetBuffy Cloud PillowCoyuchi: Up to 60% Off Bedding EssentialsIf you love the lived-in, slightly wrinkled look, Sam Cochran, AD's global features director, recommends the sturdy yet soft combo of Coyuchi’s best-selling organic relaxed linen sheets. Right now, they’re 35% off. Better yet, the matching duvet cover is marked down by 45%. Select other bath sets, duvets, and organic throw blankets, and bedspreads are also up to 57% off.Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen Sheet SetCoyuchi Temescal Organic Towels (Set of 6)Cozy Earth: Up to 20% OffCozy Earth is redefining luxury bedding with its ultrasoft, sustainable fabrics that are trending by AD’s staff. “Cozy Earth makes the best bamboo sheets, and their OG bedding is superlight and airy,” says commerce editor Audrey Lee in her review. Beyond sheets, Cozy Earth has a slew of quilts, comforters, and even baby blankets that feel like a warm hug—and they’re all 20% off.Cozy Earth Bamboo Duvet CoverCozy Earth Silk PillowcaseCrate & Barrel: Up to 60% OffWith up to 60% off bedding on sale items on Crate & Barrel’s website, now is the perfect time to upgrade your sleep sanctuary without breaking the bank. Items like duvet covers and pillowcases and shams fall under this limited-time discount event.Crate & Barrel New Natural Hemp Merrow Stitch Duvet CoverCrate & Barrel Organic Cotton Percale Tuxedo Stripe Pillow ShamHomebird: Up to 25% OffWith dreamy duvets and sheets so cozy you’ll never want to leave bed, Homebird’s got your snooze style covered and likely has the colorway to match your bedroom. For a limited time, you can get 25% off orders over $150 by using the code BOXINGDAY25 at checkout.Homebird Soft & Cozy Sateen Reversible Duvet SetHomebird Cool & Crisp Percale Flat SheetLeesa: Up to 20% OffLeesa describes its cotton blend sheet set as “luxuriously soft and naturally breathable”—two descriptors we can get behind (or under, rather) when it comes to bedding. Now until 8 a.m. ET on February 4, Leesa is offering 20% off all bedding (including pillows, blankets, sheets, and memory foam mattress toppers) and its award-winning mattresses.Leesa Cotton Blend Sheet SetLeesa Original MattressParachute: Up to 15% Off Bed and Bath BundlesThis Portugal-based organic bedding retailer is a favorite among AD staffers. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher says the sheet sets have “more of a grown up and tucked-in kind of vibe (which is a lot to say about a set of sheets).” Currently, all bedding sets (plus bath towel bundles) are 15% off.Parachute Heirloom TENCEL Linen BundleParachute 4+4 Waffle Bath BundleRest: Up to $70 OffYou’d think a name like Rest would say it all. However, beyond a good night’s rest, this company also strives to ensure a sweat-free sleep with its cooling bedding. Right now, they are offering $70 off sheet sets, $50 off comforters, $20 off pillowcases, and more.Rest Evercool+ Cooling Sheet SetRest Evercool Cooling ComforterSaatva: Up to 15% Off Mattress Sales Over $1,000Made from eco-friendly, high-quality materials like long-staple cotton and sateen weave, Saatva’s sheets feel indulgent—they’re designed to complement their renowned mattresses for the perfect night’s sleep. While the winter sale focuses on the luxury mattresses, there are a handful of bedding sets (like the sateen sheet set and memory foam pillows bundle) that are discounted. They are also offering 15% off mattress sales over $1,000.Saatva Sateen Sheet Set, Latex Pillows & Mattress Pad BundleSaatva Classic MattressSijo: Up to 15% OffSijo is known for making eucalyptus sheets with a subtle satin shine while being velvety and breathable (important for the hot sleepers among us). “These sheets have an almost liquid, viscose kind of feel,” says commerce director Rachel Fletcher. “It’s kind of like sleeping on a perfectly worn in vintage T-shirt that also keeps you from getting sweaty.” Those sets, cooling comforters, mattress pads, pillows, and everything else in their online shop are 15% off.Sijo Eucalyptus SheetsSijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus ComforterWayfair: Up to 50% OffChances are, whatever you want for your home, Wayfair has it. With a wide range of colors, patterns, and fabrics—think crisp linens, cozy flannel, and cooling percale—there’s something for every sleeper and bedroom aesthetic on this massive online retailer. And now, you can score up to 50% off on all things bed and bath.Wayfair Basics 1800 Series Sheet SetPuredown All Season Goose Down Comforter
html:
When it comes to refreshing your home, few upgrades are as satisfying—or impactful—as new bedding and bath essentials. What’s more, the best bed and bath sales arrive like clockwork around this time of year so you can shop everything from luxurious sheets to premium bath towels at a discount. Whether it has to do with people welcoming change with the new year or wanting to keep warm when the chill of winter sets in, we’re not sure, but we’ll always welcome a deal. Plus, you can instantly elevate your daily routine, making your bedroom and bathroom feel like a five-star retreat.

At Architectural Digest, we spend the entire year testing piles of sheets, bath mats, and everything in between. This list is packed with our favorite brands—think the luxe comfort of Saatva and the eco-friendly warmth of Buffy—that are offering deals right now to help you make a little home indulgence more accessible than ever.

From the plush, insulating comforters that trap warmth without feeling too bulky to the ultrasoft towels that make getting out of the shower bearable, we’ve rounded up the top bed and bath sales happening now. Prepare to snuggle up—we’ve got you covered.

Our Top Picks:

  • Best Sheet Set: Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen Sheet Set, $538 $252
  • Best Pillowcases: Cozy Earth Bamboo Pillowcases, $84 $67
  • Best Duvet Cover: Homebird Soft & Cozy Sateen Reversible Duvet, $248 $186
  • Best Mattress Pads: Sijo TempTun Cooling Mattress Pad, $175 $149
  • Best Down Comforter: Brooklinen Down Comforter, $199 $159
  • Best Bedding Sets: Buffy The Classic Set, $490 $345
  • Best Bath Towel Set: White Classic Luxury Cotton Bath Towels, $48 $45

ABC Carpet & Home: Over 20% Off

If you’re looking for a well-curated selection of duvet cover sets, hand towels, bath mats, shower curtains, and more, ABC, a New York City–based home decor brand, has you covered. Take over 20% off high-end bedding and bath finds through January 27.

abcDNA Ruya Duvet Set

abcDNA Layla Percale Sheets

Amazon: Up to 45% Off

Steep sales right this way: Check out Amazon for quality bath towels and sheet sets at a discount in the mega retailer’s daily deals page. “If you’re looking for a basic sheet at a bargain price, this sheet is a great pick,” says contributor Kristi Kellogg of the Mellanni Hotel Luxury Sheet Set. “It’s also available in every size and basically every color you could want, so you’ll definitely be able to find an option that matches the rest of your bedding.”

White Classic Luxury Cotton Bath Towels

Mellanni Hotel Luxury 1800 Sheet Set

Brooklinen: Up to 20% Off

Brooklinen has mastered the art of cozy. Known for its cloud-like comforters, this brand combines premium materials—like responsibly sourced down and lightweight down alternatives—with thoughtful details, like duvet loops, to keep your bedding in check. Now through January 21, they’re offering 20% off select items.

Brooklinen Down Comforter

Brooklinen Down Pillow

Brooklyn Bedding: Up to 25% Off

Brooklyn Bedding is a one-stop shop for all things sleep—from bed frames to memory foam pillows. Everything sitewide (with or without a mattress purchase and even on new arrivals) is currently 30% off when using the promo code MLK30 at checkout.

Brooklyn Bedding Microcoil Mattress Topper

Brooklyn Bedding Ecosleep Mattress

Buffy: Up to 30% Off Bedding Sets and 15% Off Sitewide

Buffy is famous for its silky, smooth eucalyptus sheets that are colored with plant dye (think turmeric, gardenia, and pomegranate). As part of its winter sale, Buffy is offering 30% off its earth-friendly, award-winning Classic and Cooling bedding sets and 15% off everything else sitewide, like pillows. Describing the cloud pillow, AD senior entertainment editor Rachel Wallace says it’s a “soft yet supportive” pick that’s great for side sleepers.

Buffy Breeze Sheet Set

Buffy Cloud Pillow

Coyuchi: Up to 60% Off Bedding Essentials

If you love the lived-in, slightly wrinkled look, Sam Cochran, AD's global features director, recommends the sturdy yet soft combo of Coyuchi’s best-selling organic relaxed linen sheets. Right now, they’re 35% off. Better yet, the matching duvet cover is marked down by 45%. Select other bath sets, duvets, and organic throw blankets, and bedspreads are also up to 57% off.

Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen Sheet Set

Coyuchi Temescal Organic Towels (Set of 6)

Cozy Earth: Up to 20% Off

Cozy Earth is redefining luxury bedding with its ultrasoft, sustainable fabrics that are trending by AD’s staff. “Cozy Earth makes the best bamboo sheets, and their OG bedding is superlight and airy,” says commerce editor Audrey Lee in her review. Beyond sheets, Cozy Earth has a slew of quilts, comforters, and even baby blankets that feel like a warm hug—and they’re all 20% off.

Cozy Earth Bamboo Duvet Cover

Cozy Earth Silk Pillowcase

Crate & Barrel: Up to 60% Off

With up to 60% off bedding on sale items on Crate & Barrel’s website, now is the perfect time to upgrade your sleep sanctuary without breaking the bank. Items like duvet covers and pillowcases and shams fall under this limited-time discount event.

Crate & Barrel New Natural Hemp Merrow Stitch Duvet Cover

Crate & Barrel Organic Cotton Percale Tuxedo Stripe Pillow Sham

Homebird: Up to 25% Off

With dreamy duvets and sheets so cozy you’ll never want to leave bed, Homebird’s got your snooze style covered and likely has the colorway to match your bedroom. For a limited time, you can get 25% off orders over $150 by using the code BOXINGDAY25 at checkout.

Homebird Soft & Cozy Sateen Reversible Duvet Set

Homebird Cool & Crisp Percale Flat Sheet

Leesa: Up to 20% Off

Leesa describes its cotton blend sheet set as “luxuriously soft and naturally breathable”—two descriptors we can get behind (or under, rather) when it comes to bedding. Now until 8 a.m. ET on February 4, Leesa is offering 20% off all bedding (including pillows, blankets, sheets, and memory foam mattress toppers) and its award-winning mattresses.

Leesa Cotton Blend Sheet Set

Leesa Original Mattress

Parachute: Up to 15% Off Bed and Bath Bundles

This Portugal-based organic bedding retailer is a favorite among AD staffers. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher says the sheet sets have “more of a grown up and tucked-in kind of vibe (which is a lot to say about a set of sheets).” Currently, all bedding sets (plus bath towel bundles) are 15% off.

Parachute Heirloom TENCEL Linen Bundle

Parachute 4+4 Waffle Bath Bundle

Rest: Up to $70 Off

You’d think a name like Rest would say it all. However, beyond a good night’s rest, this company also strives to ensure a sweat-free sleep with its cooling bedding. Right now, they are offering $70 off sheet sets, $50 off comforters, $20 off pillowcases, and more.

Rest Evercool+ Cooling Sheet Set

Rest Evercool Cooling Comforter

Saatva: Up to 15% Off Mattress Sales Over $1,000

Made from eco-friendly, high-quality materials like long-staple cotton and sateen weave, Saatva’s sheets feel indulgent—they’re designed to complement their renowned mattresses for the perfect night’s sleep. While the winter sale focuses on the luxury mattresses, there are a handful of bedding sets (like the sateen sheet set and memory foam pillows bundle) that are discounted. They are also offering 15% off mattress sales over $1,000.

Saatva Sateen Sheet Set, Latex Pillows & Mattress Pad Bundle

Saatva Classic Mattress

Sijo: Up to 15% Off

Sijo is known for making eucalyptus sheets with a subtle satin shine while being velvety and breathable (important for the hot sleepers among us). “These sheets have an almost liquid, viscose kind of feel,” says commerce director Rachel Fletcher. “It’s kind of like sleeping on a perfectly worn in vintage T-shirt that also keeps you from getting sweaty.” Those sets, cooling comforters, mattress pads, pillows, and everything else in their online shop are 15% off.

Sijo Eucalyptus Sheets

Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus Comforter

Wayfair: Up to 50% Off

Chances are, whatever you want for your home, Wayfair has it. With a wide range of colors, patterns, and fabrics—think crisp linens, cozy flannel, and cooling percale—there’s something for every sleeper and bedroom aesthetic on this massive online retailer. And now, you can score up to 50% off on all things bed and bath.

Wayfair Basics 1800 Series Sheet Set

Puredown All Season Goose Down Comforter
